document.full_text: prime minister benjamin netanyahu rejected talk of a crisis in israeli-u.s. relations ahead of a speech on sunday by barack obama to a pro-israel group which could give the president a cool reception.
document.title: netanyahu says differences with obama exaggerated
lines_and_colors: prime minister benjamin netanyahu rejected talk of a crisis in israeli-u.s. relations ahead of a speech on sunday by barack obama to a pro-israel group which could give the president a cool reception.
